answerText: Schwarzschild radius [10] The A-star radio source in this constellation is believed to be the supermassive black hole at the center of the Milky Way galaxy.

subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about black holes, for 10 points each: [10] Black holes are created when a bunch of matter is compressed down to this length scale, which is equal to 2 G M over c squared.
